intervention_catalogue.name: Healthy Sex Programme
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Healthy Sex Programme (HSP) is a follow-up programme for men who have completed Kaizen, Becoming New Me Plus, Horizon, or New Me Strengths. It uses cognitive behavioural therapy and is aimed at men convicted of a sexual offence, or an offence with a sexual element.
long_description: Healthy Sex Programme (HSP) is a follow-up programme for men who have completed Kaizen, Becoming New Me Plus, Horizon, or New Me Strengths. It uses cognitive behavioural therapy and is aimed at men convicted of a sexual offence, or an offence with a sexual element.

possible_outcomes: assist participant to desist from crime

risk_consideration.osp_score_guide: Medium, high or very high OSP (OASys Sexual Reconviction Predictor)
